item.description:
Just a note to let you know that they don't take reservations so I will do my best to get us all tables! 

 

The Summer Shanty! Located at Bass River Marina, The Summer Shanty is the Cape's coolest waterfront bar and restaurant. This casual eatery is open seasonally for lunch and dinner.

Their menu features littlenecks and oysters, Dan's crazy lobster rolls, steamers, scallops, salmon, swordfish, clam chowder & more! Take out & boat service is available.

In addition to having Cape Cod's largest music library, they feature live entertainment Friday and Saturday from 4 to 11pm.

If you enjoy good food, great sunsets & Mid Cape's best music scene, the "Shanty" at Bass River Marina is for you!! Come by car or by boat.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Girls Just Wanna Have Fun Table!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Shanty Grand Opening Party
